api_key.title: Affinity API Key
api_key.description: Your Affinity CRM API key (found in Settings > API Keys)

read_only.title: Read-Only Mode
read_only.description: Restrict to read-only operations (no creates, updates, or deletes)

disable_destructive.title: Disable Destructive Commands
disable_destructive.description: Block destructive commands (delete operations) even with confirmation

session_cache_ttl.title: Session Cache TTL
session_cache_ttl.description: How long to cache API responses (seconds). Lower = fresher data, higher = fewer API calls
